sailpoint.integration
Class RestClient

java.lang.Object
  sailpoint.integration.RestClient

public class RestClient
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class for sending REST-style requests and parsing responses. Responses are assumed to be JSON strings of the basic data types supported by JsonUtil.
